sub_title: Matching great people with great companies.
summary:
Ik ben een Research Consultant bij het internationale recruitment bureau Robert Walters.

Mijn team specialiseert zich in de bemiddeling van Senior level Finance professionals in de Randstad en omstreken. Denk aan posities zoals Accountancy, Financial & Business control, Finance Manager, Finance Director en CFO.

Ik luister graag naar wie jij bent, wat jij kan en vooral wat jij wil in jouw carriere. Vervolgens ga ik binnen ons netwerk van topbedrijven op zoek naar het bedrijf en de positie die zo nauw mogelijk aansluiten bij jouw ideale carrièrestap. 

Als het laatste stukje van de puzzel, zo introduceer ik jou bij je ideale baan, bij het bedrijf dat op zoek is naar hun nieuwste aanwinst. 

Het vinden van de perfecte match tussen werknemer en bedrijf, hier gaat het mij om!

Weten wat ik voor jou kan doen?
Mail je CV naar Chayenn.Rasmijn@Robertwalters.com 
Of neem telefonisch contact op: +31628346896

ENG-------

I am a Research Consultant at the international recruitment agency Robert Walters.

My team specializes in the mediation of Senior level Finance professionals in the Randstad and surrounding areas. Think of positions such as: Accountancy, Financial, Group & Business control, Finance Manager, Finance Director and CFO.

I like to listen to who you are, what you can do and especially what you want in your career. Then I will search within our network of top companies for the company and the position that matches your ideal career step as closely as possible. 

Like the final piece of the puzzle, I will introduce you to your ideal job, at the company looking for their newest asset. 

Finding the perfect match between employee and company, that is what it's all about!

Want to see what I can do for you? Mail your CV to Chayenn.Rasmijn@Robertwalters.com
Or contact me by phone: +31628346896

profile_positions.description: Robert Walters is a global leading recruitment specialist. In the Netherlands we focus on executive search, interim and permanent recruitment within accounting & finance, banking & financial services, tax, treasury, legal, HR and IT. We are active in 31 countries and in the Netherlands we have offices in Amsterdam, Eindhoven, Rotterdam and Utrecht.
profile_positions.title: Research Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Working at Direct Result was a way to really bring my sales and communication skills to the next level by challenging myself to sell more complex products. Selling good causes required very different approaches depending on the situation. For all of them confidence and creativity were needed to find the path to an agreement. Some required strong reasoning, others required a witty comebacks, most of them required both. Each sale was a puzzle that only good communication skills and creative thinking could solve.

 Because of the very different approach compared to my previous sales job. Everyday I kept running into different problems which was hard at first but by consistently improving on my sales strategies and testing it through trial and error I managed to succeed at reaching my targets. 

Adding to this I also benefited greatly from the multitude of communication and brand ambassador ship trainings that we're offered to me, enabling me to really bring my skills to the next level.

This work experience really helped me realise that just working hard is not enough to maximise
performance. You need to actively keep learning to really reach your potential.
profile_positions.title: Brand Ambassador

profile_positions.description:
Working at Pepperminds was a way for me to really step out of my comfort zone and develop my sales and communication skills.

 As a sales promotor I would head out to different cities throughout the country and spend the day there selling our clients products to consumers. The location could be on the street, in the mall, or on events. At first it was hard to come up with consistent sales numbers, but after following multiple sales and mental attitude trainings, together with experience in the field, my performance became stable and I felt extremely comfortable on the job. 

In the end I achieved my goal of stepping out of my comfort zone, and on top of that learned a lot in regards to sales, marketing and communication.
profile_positions.title: Sales Promoter
